messageBody:
> Michael Silverstein wrote:
> >
>
> > With Test Mentor (which among other things discovers and runs
> JUnit tests)
> > we use the JPDA http://java.sun.com/products/jpda/ to
> dynamically monitor
> > method entry events during test execution.
> >

> Mike Clark wrote:
> JPDA and JVMPI are great if you don't mind changing the JVM command line
> to enable their use.

For what its worth, Test Mentor uses the launching connector to launch and
run the tests, which means the whole thing is transparent to the user except
for checking a checkbox in the test runner UI.
